booking.noteText: We will email you the availability details and pricing for your requested stay. Your booking is not final until you confirm via the email link.
booking.policy2: Cancellation policy applies as per terms
booking.successMessage: Thank you for your inquiry. We will review your request and send you availability and pricing details shortly.
booking.errorMessage: Please check your information and try again.

items.title: 24/7 Room Service
items.description: Enjoy personalized in-room dining at any hour, ensuring ultimate comfort throughout your stay at Hôtel Palais Royal.

items.title: Private Airport Transfer
items.description: Arrive in style with our hassle-free airport pickup and drop-off service, offering you a seamless travel experience from doorstep to lobby.

items.title: High-Speed Wi-Fi
items.description: Stay connected for work or leisure with complimentary high-speed internet access available in all rooms and public spaces.

items.title: Gourmet Breakfast
items.description: Start your day with a lavish breakfast spread, curated by our expert chefs to suit every palate.

items.title: Rooftop Lounge
items.description: Unwind at our luxurious rooftop lounge with panoramic city views, signature cocktails, and a relaxed ambiance.

items.title: Valet Parking
items.description: Enjoy peace of mind with our professional valet parking service, making arrivals and departures effortless.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Hôtel Palais Royal, located in the heart of Sfax, offers an exceptional experience combining luxury, comfort, and traditional Tunisian hospitality.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.address: Route Mahdia (Avenue Habib Bouguatfa), Sfax 3000, Tunisia

hero.heading: Enjoy Life With The Great Moments
hero.subtitle: Unique Place And Luxury Hotel

servicesList.title: Conference & Meeting Facilities
servicesList.description: Host successful meetings and events with our fully equipped conference rooms and banquet facilities.

servicesList.title: La Bohème Restaurant
servicesList.description: Experience the best of Mediterranean, Tunisian, and international cuisine at our renowned La Bohème Restaurant.

servicesList.title: Café & Lounge
servicesList.description: Relax in our cozy and elegant Café & Lounge, where you can enjoy freshly brewed coffee and light snacks.

servicesList.title: Rooftop Bar & Lounge
servicesList.description: Take in breathtaking panoramic views of Sfax from our elegant rooftop bar.

roomList.title: Double Standard Room
roomList.description: Cozy and well-furnished, perfect for couples or business travelers.

roomList.title: Superior Double Room
roomList.description: Spacious room with elegant decor and a king-sized bed for a relaxing stay.

roomList.title: Single Standard Room
roomList.description: Ideal for solo travelers, offering a comfortable bed and essential amenities.

roomList.title: Superior Single Room
roomList.description: Enjoy extra space and refined decor in this room designed for ultimate comfort.

roomList.title: Luxury Suite
roomList.description: Our finest offering, with separate living spaces and premium amenities.

roomList.title: Triple Room
roomList.description: Perfect for families or groups, offering three beds and plenty of space to unwind.

about.hotelIntro: Welcome to Hôtel Palais Royal, where elegance meets traditional Tunisian hospitality.
about.mainHeading: A Haven of Comfort and Luxury
about.culinaryDescription: Our on-site restaurant, La Bohème, offers a curated menu combining Mediterranean, Tunisian, and international cuisine.

contact.mainHeading: We'd Love to Hear from You
contact.description: Our team is dedicated to ensuring your stay at Hôtel Palais Royal is exceptional. Feel free to reach out for any inquiries or special requests.
contact.address: Route Mahdia (Avenue Habib Bouguatfa), Sfax 3000, Tunisia
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

economySingle.title: Small Single Room
economySingle.description: Cozy and well-equipped room perfect for solo travelers. Features include minibar, desk, walk-in closet, shower, free toiletries, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

superiorSingle.title: Superior Single Room
superiorSingle.description: Spacious single room with enhanced comfort. Features include minibar, desk, walk-in closet, private bathroom with bathtub and slippers, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

economyDouble.title: Standard Double Room
economyDouble.description: Comfortable double room ideal for couples or friends. Features include 2 twin beds, minibar, desk, walk-in closet, shower, free toiletries, flat-screen TV, air conditioning, and complimentary Wi-Fi. Children's cribs available on request.

superiorDouble.title: Superior Double Room
superiorDouble.description: Spacious and elegantly decorated double room with enhanced amenities. Features include 2 twin beds, minibar, desk, walk-in closet, private bathroom with bathtub and slippers, flat-screen TV, air conditioning, and complimentary Wi-Fi. Crib available on request.

triple.title: Triple Room
triple.description: Spacious family room accommodating up to 3 adults and 2 children. Features include 3 twin beds, minibar, desk, walk-in closet, private bathroom with bathtub, flat-screen TV, air conditioning, and complimentary Wi-Fi. Cribs available on request.

suite.title: King Suite
suite.description: Our most luxurious accommodation featuring a separate living area and private balcony. Includes 1 king bed (extra-long), coffee machine, minibar, desk, walk-in closet, bathroom with both bathtub and shower, flat-screen TV, air conditioning, and complimentary Wi-Fi.
